entities.description: The level of severity of an injury experienced by a respondent.
A type of injury classified as minor, such as apparent minor injury.
A type of injury classified as major, including instances like apparent broken bones.
A type of injury involving internal organs or tissues.
Information about the presence of missing data.

relationships.description: Indicates the severity of the injury the respondent has experienced.
Classifies injuries as minor, such as apparent minor injury.
Classifies injuries as major, including instances like apparent broken bones.
Classifies injuries as involving internal organs or tissues.
Indicates the presence of missing data in the survey responses.
